ygData.subject: RE: Some Information on Our Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Could be you just have a busier crushbone than I usually see.  I generally have about 15 people in Crushbone when I was there, though I have seen 50 or so.
ygData.messageBody:
Could be you just have a busier crushbone than I usually see. I generally
have about 15 people in Crushbone when I was there, though I have seen 50 or
so. With only 15 people, and 8 of those camping the throneroom, the orc
population fills the place.
Don't know if you'e seen the breakdown on crushbone that talks about the
"two Crushbones" one empty with occasional death trains, and the other very
populous with wandering legionnaires or not, but it is highly accurate of
what I've seen. I usually end up with the latter and the two wandering
patrols of 6 Cents and 2 Legionnaires total would be disastrous to have walk
in and get agro, the 2 legos I can handle, adding the 6 cents is suicide.

'Just my 6 cents worth'

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 2:00 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Some Information on Our Songs


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 12:46 PM 8/26/99 -0600, you wrote:
>Place 5: I can't imagine the nightmare this would cause in Crushbone as
>every green Centurion in range started stunning me.

Strange, Kitasi, I hunt in Crushbone a lot, and while I'm careful to keep
an eye on what's around me, I frequently will stand next to a mass-melee
with the Lullaby going, just to irritate the orcs ;) While I often end up
with 4-8 angry orcs on me, it's never more than I saw (they don't "come out
of the woodwork") and usually I don't have any real problem with it.

I wonder what I'm doing differently?

Talies the Wanderer
